title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8154.04 - Village of Newark
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8154.04 - Village of Newark

State Regulations
(a) [Eff. until

Sept. 24, 1997, see also subd. (a) below.] Route 88 between Harrison Street and Silver Hill Road. (a) [Eff. Sept. 24, 1997, see also subd. (a) above.] [Repealed]
(b) Harrison Street between Route 88 and

Siegrist Street. (c) Siegrist

Street between Harrison Street and Norton Street. (d) Blackmar Street between Siegrist Street
and the entrance to the Mark Steven Service Merchandisers, Inc., terminal. (e) Finch Street between

Route 31 and the Wayne Plaza Shopping Center. (f) Silver Hill Road between Route 88 and the

Industrial Park owned by Eastman Kodak. (g) East Miller Street between Route 31 and

Hoffman Street. (h) Hoffman Street
between East Miller Street and the Seneca Foods plant. (i) Norton Street between Siegrist Street and
its dead end. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8154.04

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
